TopicTitle: Custom staging icons: Anyone know how to do them?

Articles.Content: Getting a bit tired of trying to figure out which of several decouplers or solid boosters is which.

I don\'t think that is modifiable by users.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

I don\'t think that is modifiable by users.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Blast. I was wondering, \'cause I saw 'icon =' lines in a few .cfgs, but couldn\'t find any docs about it or resources it referred to.

Ah well.

I think that allows you to set a parts icon from a given set already present in the game rather than add a custom one.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
